WorkItem.Description:
I have reopened the issue “OnInput should be protected not internal” because without this extension point we are not able to create own DataGridColumns that behave similar to the built-in ones.
 
Original issue: http://wpf.codeplex.com/WorkItem/View.aspx?WorkItemId=8416
WorkItem.Summary: DataGridColumn 'void OnInput(InputEventArgs e)' should be protected not internal (reopen)
